name: Digital Bullet Journal
description: A PWA made for my Final Year Project, that aims to capture the user experience of the paper-based Bullet Journal planning system digitally.

name: McIntire Fruit
description: A site designed and developed for a fictional organic fruit-and-veg company, using Vue and Wordpress REST API.

name: Meow Meow Chat
description: A cat-themed chat room created using websockets, a Node.js server and Vue.

name: To-Do To-Day
description: A daily to-do list web application developed using React and styled using TailwindCSS.

name: Blinkie Maker
description: An old-school blinkie maker where you can use a drag-and-drop editor to create a pixel-themed GIF.

name: Gift Profile
description: Create a profile to share your gift preferences, clothing sizes and wishlists with your friends and family.
